Plot: An engaged couple's backpacking trip in the Caucasus Mountains is derailed by a single misstep that threatens to undo everything the pair believed about each other and about themselves.
Title: The Loneliest Planet
Writer: Tom Bissell (short story "Expensive Trips Nowhere" from the collection 'God Lives In St. Petersburg'), Mikhail Lermontov (excerpt from 'A Hero Of Our Time'), Julia Loktev
Actors: Hani Furstenberg, Gael García Bernal, Bidzina Gujabidze, Tali Pitakhelauri
tomatoConsensus: The source material that inspired The Loneliest Planet may be brief, but this adaptation of a Tom Bissell short story compensates with studious, finely detailed filmmaking, haunting visuals, and thought-provoking subtext.
